title: Welcome
html: Please be patient as we are building the JSON driven ChaosCMS Lite Version right here on our domain.

title: Join Us?
html: Take a peek at the Codex and the Roadmap, if you have experience in JSON/PHP/MySQL and want to jump in on this project, send us a message to devteam at chaoscms dot org

title: Support
html: Once we have everything ported over and working, a form will be available, for now, use support at chaoscms dot org
